data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Alto Paraguay.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alto Paraguay, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Alto Paraguay, Paraguay, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Alto Paraguay to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,202 believers in Alto Paraguay that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Alto Paraguay, Paraguay. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Alto Paraguay, Paraguay.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,202 believers in Alto Paraguay, Paraguay a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Alto Paraguay, Paraguay has a population of 15,000.

We estimate Alto Paraguay has 1,202 people who might know Jesus, 13,137 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 661 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.
